main.description: Official Tamanu website - Open source electronic medical record system

ProductOverview.Summary: Tamanu is an open-source electronic medical record system designed for healthcare facilities in low-resource settings.
ProductOverview.Description: Tamanu provides comprehensive patient management capabilities including patient registration, clinical documentation, pharmacy management, and reporting. It is designed to be user-friendly and suitable for facilities with limited technical resources while maintaining high standards of data security and privacy.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Comprehensive electronic medical record system for healthcare facilities
ProductOverview.Users: Healthcare providers, nurses, pharmacists, and administrative staff in healthcare facilities

Reach.SummaryOfReach: Tamanu has been implemented in various healthcare facilities globally to support patient care and health information management.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: Tamanu is developed and maintained by Baobab Labs with support from the global health information systems community.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: Baobab Labs
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source health software development organization

Sustainability.Description: Tamanu is supported through open source development and community contributions.
